p: The effect of the methanol extract as well as the partitioned extracts of L. sericeus on acetic acid-induced writhing in mice, are presented in Table 5. The result revealed the ability of the extract and partitioned fractions to reduce acid-abdominal constrictions and stretching of mice hind limbs in a dose-dependent manner. These reductions were statistically (p<0.001) significant relative to distilled water but not as potent as ASA.
